name: Create EZOfficeInventory users from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new user in EZOfficeInventory. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wFvPwFQhexiwyC9nHoSbIB2CoE_6yZcQ281zBIt1ZRs/edit?usp=sharing).
